p:
Values of the correlation coefficient R 2 are about one using the equation of Langmuir, but they are (slightly below) some lower if it is calculated by the equation of Freundlich. For copper the plot linearity in the coordinates ( lg C
t
â€“ lg SE) of the Freundlich equation keeps up to the equilibrium concentration from 0.045 up to 0.9 mg-eq/L, the correlation coefficient R
2 = 0.846.
